## CourseStructure interface

Course-structure of a specific user which extends [ToolModel](https://gitlab.fokus.fraunhofer.de/learning-technologies/clm-framework/clm-ext-tool/-/blob/dev/docs/clm-ext-tools.itoolmodel.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CourseStructure extends BaseDatamodel 
```
<b>Extends:</b> BaseDatamodel
